title: Request for Body Cam Footage of Incident – DaniLeigh DUI Arrest

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

Incident Details for Footage Retrieval:

Date: May 30, 2023
Location: Miami Beach, Florida
Individual Involved: Danielle Leigh Curiel (DaniLeigh)
Incident Summary: Miami Beach police arrested DaniLeigh around 8:15 AM following a DUI hit-and-run crash that left a moped driver with serious injuries, including a kidney laceration and spinal fracture. Officers reported that DaniLeigh was speeding and swerving before striking the victim. She was later stopped and administered a breathalyzer, which showed a BAC of 0.148—nearly twice the legal limit. The arrest resulted in three felony charges, including DUI with serious bodily injury and leaving the scene of an accident.
I am requesting copies of all body-worn camera footage from officers who:

Responded to the crash scene and interacted with the injured victim.
Conducted the traffic stop on DaniLeigh’s vehicle.
Administered the field sobriety and breathalyzer tests.
Processed her arrest and transport to Turner Guilford Knight Correctional Center.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Harun
